description: Returns information about all block storage disks in your AWS account and region.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetDisks request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: disks
nested_items.description: An array of objects containing information about all block storage disks.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The unique name of the disk.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the disk.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about an instance or another resource in Lightsail. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the disk was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The Lightsail resource type ( Disk).

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: addOns
nested_items.description: An array of objects representing the add-ons enabled on the disk.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the add-on.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the add-on.

nested_items.name: snapshotTimeOfDay
nested_items.description: The daily time when an automatic snapshot is created.

nested_items.name: nextSnapshotTimeOfDay
nested_items.description: The next daily time an automatic snapshot will be created.

nested_items.name: threshold
nested_items.description: The trigger threshold of the action.

nested_items.name: duration
nested_items.description: The amount of idle time in minutes after which your virtual computer will automatically stop.

nested_items.name: sizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the disk in GB.

nested_items.name: isSystemDisk
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether this disk is a system disk (has an operating system loaded on it).

nested_items.name: iops
nested_items.description: The input/output operations per second (IOPS) of the disk.

nested_items.name: path
nested_items.description: The disk path.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: Describes the status of the disk.

nested_items.name: attachedTo
nested_items.description: The resources to which the disk is attached.

nested_items.name: isAttached
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the disk is attached.

nested_items.name: attachmentState
nested_items.description: (Discontinued) The attachment state of the disk.

nested_items.name: gbInUse
nested_items.description: (Discontinued) The number of GB in use by the disk.

nested_items.name: autoMountStatus
nested_items.description: The status of automatically mounting a storage disk to a virtual computer.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
